name: Glitchy Game Console
description: Controls: Arrow keys - move / select block Z - shoot / rotate selected block X - use heal SPACE - turn your TV off Items: · Speed Boost: Makes you move faster. · Cooler gun: Deals 2 damage instead of 1. · Heal: Restores 1 health. Press X to use it. · Key: Opens the portal. Items drop from chests and display at the top-right corner of your screen. Gameplay: You play as a spaceship that can shoot enemies: Your game console is broken, so glitches appear on the screen over time. You need to TURN OFF the screen to remove all the glitches: You need to place all the pieces on the correct position to TURN ON the screen again: Open chests to get different items: Your goal is to find the key and enter the portal to defeat the final boss: About: The game was made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3. The theme was "ON / OFF".
